mapper.insert: insert into `Problem_submit_record` (`status`, `user_id`, `problem_id`, `time_used`, `memory_used`, `submit_time`, `compiler_id`, `code_length`, `source`) values (#{record.status, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.userId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.problemId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.timeUsed, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.memoryUsed, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.submitTime, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{record.compilerId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.codeLength, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.source, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(`submit_time` / 1000, '%H') AS `time`, count(*) AS submit_all FROM `Problem_submit_record` WHERE `submit_time` BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY FROM_UNIXTIME(`submit_time` / 1000, '%H')

SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(`submit_time` / 1000, '%H') AS `time`, count(*) AS submit_ac FROM `Problem_submit_record` WHERE `status` = 0 and `submit_time` BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY FROM_UNIXTIME(`submit_time` / 1000, '%H')

SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(`submit_time` / 1000, '%w') AS `name`, count(*) AS `value` FROM `Problem_submit_record` WHERE `user_id` = #{userId} and `submit_time` BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY FROM_UNIXTIME(`submit_time` / 1000, '%w')

SELECT #{num} as `num`, `problem_id` as `problem_id`, `first_submit_time` as `submit_time` FROM ( SELECT `problem_id`, min(`submit_time`) AS `first_submit_time` FROM `Problem_submit_record` WHERE `user_id` = #{userId} AND `status` = #{status} GROUP BY `problem_id` ORDER BY min(`submit_time`) ) tmp LIMIT ${num - 1}, 1
